alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 8:57AM AKST until January 11 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions are expected today with conditions improving tonight as winds decrease.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
